title: Caregiver's own identity preserved amid intensive care work
description: Caregiver's own identity preserved amid intensive care work
content:
Scenario: Caregiver's own identity preserved amid intensive care work
    Given James's life is consumed by caregiving responsibilities
    And he risks losing his identity as caregiving intensifies
    When the personal_agent monitors James's individual well-being
    Then it should protect tiny spaces for his own identity
    And it should remind him that his flourishing matters too
    And it should recognize when caregiving threatens his sense of self
    And it should prompt activities that sustain his individual identity
    And caregiving should not erase who James is as a person
